verses.verse: Therefore thou shalt love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his charge <S%H4931><s%>, and his statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and his judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, alway <S%H3117><s%>.

And know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ye this day <S%H3117><s%>: for I speak not with your children <S%H1121><s%> which have not known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and which have not seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the chastisement <S%H4148><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, his greatness <S%H1433><s%>, his mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and his stretched out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8803><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>,

And his miracles <S%H226><s%>, and his acts <S%H4639><s%>, which he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and unto all his land <S%H776><s%>;

And what he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the army <S%H2428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, unto their horses <S%H5483><s%>, and to their chariots <S%H7393><s%>; how he made the water <S%H4325><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> to overflow <S%H6687><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them <S%H6440><s%> as they pursued <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8800><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you, and how the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath destroyed <S%H6><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them unto this day <S%H3117><s%>;
And what he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto you in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, until ye came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into this place <S%H4725><s%>;

And what he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab <S%H446><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>: how the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6475><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and swallowed them up <S%H1104><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and their households <S%H1004><s%>, and their tents <S%H168><s%>, and all the substance <S%H3351><s%> that was in their possession <S%H7272><s%>, in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>:
But your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8802><s%> all the great <S%H1419><s%> acts <S%H4639><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> which he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Therefore shall ye keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, that ye may be strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, whither ye go <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it;

And that ye may prolong <S%H748><s%> <S%H8686><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto them and to their seed <S%H2233><s%>, a land <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.

For the land <S%H776><s%>, whither thou goest in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it, is not as the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from whence ye came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, where thou sowedst <S%H2232><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy seed <S%H2233><s%>, and wateredst <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it with thy foot <S%H7272><s%>, as a garden <S%H1588><s%> of herbs <S%H3419><s%>:

But the land <S%H776><s%>, whither ye go <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it, is a land <S%H776><s%> of hills <S%H2022><s%> and valleys <S%H1237><s%>, and drinketh <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of the rain <S%H4306><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>:

A land <S%H776><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> careth for <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> are always <S%H8548><s%> upon it, from the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%> even unto the end <S%H319><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%>.

And it shall come to pass, if ye shall hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> diligently <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto my Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and to serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him with all your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul <S%H5315><s%>,

That I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you the rain <S%H4306><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%> in his due season <S%H6256><s%>, the first rain <S%H3138><s%> and the latter rain <S%H4456><s%>, that thou mayest gather <S%H622><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thy corn <S%H1715><s%>, and thy wine <S%H8492><s%>, and thine oil <S%H3323><s%>.

And I will send <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> grass <S%H6212><s%> in thy fields <S%H7704><s%> for thy cattle <S%H929><s%>, that thou mayest eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and be full <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Take heed <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8734><s%> to yourselves, that your heart <S%H3824><s%> be not deceived <S%H6601><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and ye turn aside <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, and worship <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8694><s%> them;

And then the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> wrath <S%H639><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against you, and he shut up <S%H6113><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%>, that there be no rain <S%H4306><s%>, and that the land <S%H127><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not her fruit <S%H2981><s%>; and lest ye perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> from off the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> you.

Therefore shall ye lay up <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> these my words <S%H1697><s%> in your heart <S%H3824><s%> and in your soul <S%H5315><s%>, and bind <S%H7194><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them for a sign <S%H226><s%> upon your hand <S%H3027><s%>, that they may be as frontlets <S%H2903><s%> between your eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And ye shall teach <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them your children <S%H1121><s%>, speaking <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> of them when thou sittest <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in thine house <S%H1004><s%>, and when thou walkest <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%>, when thou liest <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8800><s%> down, and when thou risest up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.
And thou shalt write <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them upon the door posts <S%H4201><s%> of thine house <S%H1004><s%>, and upon thy gates <S%H8179><s%>:

That your days <S%H3117><s%> may be multiplied <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and the days <S%H3117><s%> of your children <S%H1121><s%>, in the land <S%H127><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them, as the days <S%H3117><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

For if ye shall diligently <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all these Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> you, to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them, to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in all his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to cleave <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto him;

Then will the YY <S%H3068><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%> all these nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, and ye shall possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than yourselves.

Havahry place <S%H4725><s%> whereon the soles <S%H3709><s%> of your feet <S%H7272><s%> shall tread <S%H1869><s%> <S%H8799><s%> shall be yours: from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>, from the river <S%H5104><s%>, the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates <S%H6578><s%>, even unto the uttermost <S%H314><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> shall your coast <S%H1366><s%> be.

There shall no man <S%H376><s%> be able to stand <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8691><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall lay <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the fear <S%H6343><s%> of you and the dread <S%H4172><s%> of you upon <S%H6440><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> that ye shall tread <S%H1869><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon, as he hath said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto you.
Behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> a b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> and a curse <S%H7045><s%>;

A b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%>, if ye obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>:

And a curse <S%H7045><s%>, if ye will not obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, but turn aside <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8804><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, to go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, which ye have not known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And it shall come to pass, when the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath brought thee in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> whither thou goest <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it, that thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> upon mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim <S%H1630><s%>, and the curse <S%H7045><s%> upon mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal <S%H5858><s%>.

Are they not on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%>, by <S%H310><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> where the sun <S%H8121><s%> goeth down <S%H3996><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%>, which dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the champaign <S%H6160><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, beside <S%H681><s%> the plains <S%H436><s%> of Moreh <S%H4176><s%> ?

For ye shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> to go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> you, and ye shall possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> therein.

And ye shall observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> all the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> which I set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>.
